description: Table a(i,j) = product prime[k]^(Ei[k] OR Ej[k]) where Ei and Ej are the vectors of exponents in the prime factorizations of i and j; OR is the bitwise operation on binary representation of the exponents.
comments: Analogous to LCM, with OR replacing MAX.
author: _Marc LeBrun_, Feb 06 2001
